game_desc: A client emulator for YGO: Power of Chaos game series ported to browser.

error.an_error_has_occured_please_contact_admi: An error has occured! Please contact administrator.

login.title: YGO PoC EMU
login.account_already_in_use: Account is already in use! Click 'Login' again to override and reconnect.
login.invalid_credentials: The password you have entered is incorrect!

126218.name: Skull Dice
126218.desc: Roll a six-sided die. All monsters your opponent currently controls lose ATK/DEF equal to the result x 100, until the end of this turn.

296499.name: The Regulation of Tribe
296499.desc:
Activate this card by declaring 1 Monster Type. Monsters with the declared Type cannot declare an attack. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, Tribute 1 monster or destroy this card.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.
strings: Tribute 1 monster for the effect of "The Regulation of Tribe"?

423705.name: Gearfried the Iron Knight
423705.desc: If either player equips an Equip Card(s) to this card: Destroy that Equip Card(s).

473469.name: Driving Snow
473469.desc: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your Trap Cards are destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect your opponent controls. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

1248895.name: Chain Destruction
1248895.desc: When a monster(s) with 2000 or less ATK is Summoned: Target 1 of them; destroy all cards with that name in its controller's hand and Main Deck.

1918087.name: Minor Goblin Official
1918087.desc: You can only activate this card when your opponent's Life Points are 3000 or less. Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases.

2130625.name: Numinous Healer
2130625.desc: You can only activate this card when you take damage to your Life Points. Increase your Life Points by 1000 points. Also, increase your Life Points by 500 points for each "Numinous Healer" card in your Graveyard.

2311603.name: Overdrive
2311603.desc: An all-terrain armored vehicle armed with a heavy-duty machine gun.

2370081.name: Steel Shell
2370081.desc: A WATER monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

3134241.name: Flying Kamakiri #2
3134241.desc: A flying mantis that feeds primarily on insects.

3366982.name: Alligator's Sword Dragon
3366982.desc:
"Baby Dragon" + "Alligator's Sword"
This card can attack your opponent directly if the only face-up monsters they control are EARTH, WATER, or FIRE.

3573512.name: Swordsman of Landstar
3573512.desc: An amateur with a sword, this fairy warrior relies on its mysterious powers.

3643300.name: The Legendary Fisherman
3643300.desc: While "Umi" is on the field, this card is unaffected by Spell effects and cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.

3797883.name: Slot Machine
3797883.desc: The machine's ability is said to vary according to its slot results.

4031928.name: Change of Heart
4031928.desc: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

4042268.name: Island Turtle
4042268.desc: A huge turtle that is often mistaken for an island.

4266839.name: Kiseitai
4266839.desc: When your opponent's monster attacks this card in face-down Defense Position, this card becomes an Equip Spell Card equipped to the attacking monster (No damage calculation is conducted). During each of your opponent's Standby Phases, increase your Life Points by half of the ATK of the monster equipped with this card.

4796100.name: Chimera the Flying Mythical Beast
4796100.desc:
"Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" + "Berfomet"
(This card is always treated as a "Phantom Beast" card.)
When this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Berfomet" or 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" in your GY; Special Summon that target.

4920010.name: Souls of the Forgotten
4920010.desc: A wicked spirit created by the hateful souls of those who fell in battle. It grows by assimilating the souls of its enemies.

5265750.name: Skull Mariner
5265750.desc: A pirate ship that appears out of the mist and sinks any seagoing vessels.

5318639.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
5318639.desc: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

5388481.name: Darkfire Soldier #1
5388481.desc: An explosive expert from a special elite force.

5434080.name: Headless Knight
5434080.desc: A haunted spirit of a falsely accused knight who wanders in search of truth and justice.

5494820.name: Cyclon Laser
5494820.desc: You can only equip this card to "Gradius". Increase the ATK of "Gradius" by 300 points. When the equipped "Gradius" attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

5616412.name: Destruction Punch
5616412.desc: If the ATK of an attacking monster your opponent controls is lower than the DEF of the attacked Defense Position monster you control, destroy the attacking monster at the end of the Damage Step. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

5758500.name: Soul Release
5758500.desc: Target up to 5 cards in any GY(s); banish them.

5818798.name: Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts
5818798.desc:
This monster moves so fast that it looks like an illusion to mortal eyes.

(This card is always treated as a "Phantom Beast" card.)

6104968.name: Bubonic Vermin
6104968.desc: FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Bubonic Vermin" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position. Then shuffle your Deck.
strings: Special Summon 1 "Bubonic Vermin" from your Deck?

6285791.name: The Wicked Worm Beast
6285791.desc: This face-up card on the field is returned to the owner's hand during the End Phase of your turn.

6343408.name: Miracle Dig
6343408.desc: If at least 5 of your monsters are banished: Target 3 of them; return them to the GY.

6733059.name: Skull Lair
6733059.desc: Remove from play any number of Monster Cards in your Graveyard to destroy 1 face-up monster on the field whose Level is equal to the number of the cards you removed from play.
strings: Please select the number of monsters to banish

7019529.name: Insect Soldiers of the Sky
7019529.desc: The ATK of this card increases by 1000 points whenever it attacks a WIND monster.

7165085.name: Bait Doll
7165085.desc: Target 1 Set card in the Spell & Trap Card Zone; reveal that target, force its activation if it is a Trap Card, then negate its effect if the activation timing is incorrect, and if you do, destroy it. (If it is not a Trap Card, return it face-down.) When this card resolves, shuffle it into the Deck instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

7565547.name: Collected Power
7565547.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip it with all Equip Cards on the field. If any of those Equip Cards is now equipped to an incorrect target, destroy that Equip Card.

7892180.name: Psychic Kappa
7892180.desc: An amphibian with a myriad of powers to shield it from enemy attacks.

7914843.name: Electromagnetic Bagworm
7914843.desc:
FLIP: Target 1 Machine-Type monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until your next End Phase.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

8131171.name: Sinister Serpent
8131171.desc: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can return it to your hand, also banish 1 "Sinister Serpent" from your GY during your opponent's next End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Sinister Serpent" once per turn.

8687195.name: Dreamsprite
8687195.desc: When attacked by your opponent's monster, select another 1 of your Monster Cards and designate it as the attack's target, then calculate damage.

8951260.name: Respect Play
8951260.desc: During their respective turns, each player must show their opponent their hand.

9074847.name: Major Riot
9074847.desc: If a monster(s) you control returns to your hand by an opponent's card effect: Return as many monsters on the field to the hand as possible, then each player Special Summons monsters from their hand, in face-down Defense Position, equal to the number of Monster Cards that were returned to their hand.

10262698.name: The Statue of Easter Island
10262698.desc: A stone monument from Easter Island that launches laser blasts from its rock-hewn lips.

10352095.name: Scroll of Bewitchment
10352095.desc: Activate this card by declaring 1 Attribute; the equipped monster becomes that Attribute.

10538007.name: Leogun
10538007.desc: Huge monster with a lion's mane similar to the King of Beasts.

10992251.name: Gradius
10992251.desc: A high-performance jet fighter with power capsules for variable attack capabilities.

11549357.name: Gamma The Magnet Warrior
11549357.desc: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

11901678.name: Black Skull Dragon
11901678.desc:
"Summoned Skull" + "Red-Eyes Black Dragon"
(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)

12253117.name: World Suppression
12253117.desc: You can activate this card when a Field Spell Card is activated. Negate the Field Spell Card during the turn this card is activated.

12493482.name: Dunames Dark Witch
12493482.desc: Even when all odds are against this brave fairy, she will press onwards in battle and never retreat.

12800777.name: Garuda the Wind Spirit
12800777.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 WIND monster from your GY. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position.

12883044.name: Flame Dancer
12883044.desc: This monster moves while swinging its burning rope.

12953226.name: Nuvia the Wicked
12953226.desc: If this monster is Normal Summoned, destroy this card. If your opponent controls any monster, decrease the ATK of this card by 200 points for each monster on your opponents side of the field.

13522325.name: Spirit of Flames
13522325.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 FIRE monster from your GY. Gains 300 ATK during your Battle Phase only.

13676474.name: Grand Tiki Elder
13676474.desc: A masked monster that wields the most deadly of curses.

14644902.name: Summoner of Illusions
14644902.desc: FLIP: Tribute 1 other monster, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, but destroy it during the End Phase of this turn.

15023985.name: Stone Ogre Grotto
15023985.desc: A behemoth shaped by giant boulders.

15259703.name: Toon World
15259703.desc: Activate this card by paying 1000 LP.

15866454.name: Spiritualism
15866454.desc:
Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; return it to the hand. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.

16227556.name: Inspection
16227556.desc: During your opponent's Standby Phase, you can randomly select 1 card in your opponent's hand and look at it at the cost of 500 Life Points.

17449108.name: Nobleman of Extermination
17449108.desc: Target 1 face-down Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, banish it, then, if it was a Trap, each player reveals their Main Deck, then banishes all cards from it with that card's name.

17985575.name: Lord of D.
17985575.desc: Neither player can target Dragon monsters on the field with card effects.

18144507.name: Harpie's Feather Duster
18144507.desc: Destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls.
strings: Destroy all Spells/Traps your opponent controls

18605135.name: Tornado Wall
18605135.desc: Activate only if "Umi" is on the field. While "Umi" is on the field, you take no battle damage. If "Umi" is not on the field, destroy this card.

18937875.name: Burning Spear
18937875.desc: A FIRE monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

19230408.name: Offerings to the Doomed
19230408.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy that target, also skip your next Draw Phase.

19406822.name: Kotodama
19406822.desc: If there are face-up monsters with the same name on the field, destroy those monsters. (If a monster is Summoned or flipped-face up that has the same name as a monster that is already face-up on the field, the new face-up monster is destroyed. If they are Summoned or flipped face-up at the same time, they are all destroyed.)

19827717.name: Return of the Doomed
19827717.desc: Discard 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard. Return 1 of your monsters destroyed and sent to your Graveyard as a result of battle during this turn to your hand at the end of this turn.

20228463.name: Ceremonial Bell
20228463.desc: Both players must keep their hands revealed.

20765952.name: Mask of Dispel
20765952.desc: Select 1 face-up Spell Card on the field. The controller of the Spell Card takes 500 points of damage during each of your Standby Phases. When the selected card is removed from the field, destroy this card.

21015833.name: Hayabusa Knight
21015833.desc: This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.

21237481.name: Type Zero Magic Crusher
21237481.desc: Discard 1 Spell Card from your hand to inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.
strings: Activate the effect of "Type Zero Magic Crusher"?

21297224.name: Hysteric Fairy
21297224.desc: Offer 2 monsters on your side of the field as a Tribute to increase your Life Points by 1000 points.

21340051.name: Boar Soldier
21340051.desc: This card can only be summoned by a Flip Summon. If summoned by a Normal Summon, the card is destroyed. If your opponent has 1 or more monsters under his/her control, the ATK of this card is decreased by 1000 points.

21558682.name: Jam Defender
21558682.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack on a monster you control: You can target 1 "Revival Jam" you control; switch the attack target to that target.

21598948.name: Fairy Box
21598948.desc: When your opponent's monster declares an attack: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, the attacking monster's ATK becomes 0 until the end of the Battle Phase. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card.
strings: Pay 500 LP for the maintenance cost of "Fairy Box"?

21770260.name: Jam Breeding Machine
21770260.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Special Summon 1 "Slime Token" (Aqua/WATER/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) in Attack Position. You cannot Summon any monsters, except "Slime Tokens" (but you can Set).

21817254.name: Mega Thunderball
21817254.desc: Rolls along the ground releasing bolts of electricity to attack its enemies.

21888494.name: Chosen One
21888494.desc: Select 1 Monster Card and 2 non-Monster Cards from your hand. Your opponent randomly selects 1 card among them. If it is a Monster Card, it is Special Summoned and send the remaining 2 cards to the Graveyard. If not, send all the cards to the Graveyard.

22359980.name: Mirror Wall
22359980.desc: Halve the ATK of your opponent's attacking monsters. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 2000 LP or destroy this card.

22419772.name: Fairy Guardian
22419772.desc: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 Spell Card sent to your Graveyard by your opponent during this turn to the bottom of your Deck.

22537443.name: Sebek's Blessing
22537443.desc: If your monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Gain the same amount of LP.

22567609.name: Nimble Momonga
22567609.desc: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Gain 1000 LP, then you can Special Summon any number of "Nimble Momonga" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.
strings: Special Summon another "Nimble Momonga" from your Deck?

22702055.name: Umi
22702055.desc: All Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Machine and Pyro monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

22959079.name: Dimensionhole
22959079.desc: Select 1 monster on your side of the field and remove it from play until your next Standby Phase. While the monster is removed from play, the Monster Card Zone of the selected monster cannot be used.

23171610.name: Limiter Removal
23171610.desc: Double the ATK of all Machine monsters you currently control, until the end of this turn. During the End Phase of this turn, destroy those monsters.
strings: Double the ATK of all Machine monsters you control

23289281.name: Karate Man
23289281.desc: You can double the original ATK of this card once per turn. If you used this effect, destroy this card during the End Phase.

23424603.name: Wasteland
23424603.desc: All Dinosaur, Zombie, and Rock monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

23615409.name: Insect Barrier
23615409.desc: Insect-Type monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack.

24094653.name: Polymerization
24094653.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.
strings: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck

24128274.name: Deepsea Warrior
24128274.desc: As long as "Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards.

24294108.name: Burning Land
24294108.desc: When this card is activated: If there are any Field Spell Cards on the field, destroy them. During each player's Standby Phase: The turn player takes 500 damage.

25774450.name: Mystic Box
25774450.desc: Target 1 monster your opponent controls and 1 monster you control; destroy the first target, then give control of the second target to your opponent.

26202165.name: Sangan
26202165.desc: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Sangan" once per turn.

26302522.name: Blast Sphere
26302522.desc: If this face-down Defense Position card was attacked by an opponent's monster, before damage calculation: Equip this card to the attacking monster. Then, during your opponent's next Standby Phase: Destroy the monster this card is equipped to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field.

26376390.name: Copycat
26376390.desc: If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card's ATK/DEF become equal to that monster's original ATK/DEF.

26902560.name: Fusion Sage
26902560.desc: Add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand.

27132350.name: Fire Sorcerer
27132350.desc: FLIP: Randomly select 2 cards from your hand and remove them from play to inflict 800 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

27671321.name: Lightning Conger
27671321.desc: This massive eel generates huge charges of electricity and unleashes them as thunderbolts.

27827272.name: Makiu, the Magical Mist
27827272.desc: Target 1 "Summoned Skull", or 1 Thunder monster, in your Monster Zone; destroy all monsters your opponent controls with DEF less than or equal to the ATK of that monster. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

27911550.name: Parasite Paracide
27911550.desc:
FLIP: Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck.
If you draw this card after it was added to your Deck by its effect: Special Summon it in Defense Position, and if you do, take 1000 damage. All monsters controlled by the player that Summoned this card by its effect become Insect monsters.

28358902.name: Crimson Sentry
28358902.desc: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 of your monsters destroyed in battle during this turn to the bottom of your Deck.

30208479.name: Magician of Black Chaos
30208479.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Black Magic Ritual".

30325729.name: Dokuroyaiba
30325729.desc: A boomerang with brains that will pursue a target to the ends of the earth.

30532390.name: Sky Scout
30532390.desc: With eyes like a hawk and a flying speed exceeding Mach 5, this monster is a master of the sky.

30606547.name: The Dark Door
30606547.desc: Only 1 monster can attack during each Battle Phase.

30655537.name: Cyber Falcon
30655537.desc:
A jet-powered hawk that travels at the speed of sound.

(This card is not treated as a "Cyber" card.)

30860696.name: Rocket Warrior
30860696.desc: During your Battle Phase, this card cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no damage from battles involving this card. If this card attacks a monster, after damage calculation: That attack target loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

31447217.name: Wingweaver
31447217.desc: A six-winged fairy who prays for peace and hope.

31477025.name: Mr. Volcano
31477025.desc: This seemingly mild-mannered creature has an extremely volatile temper.

31709826.name: Revival Jam
31709826.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can pay 1000 LP; Special Summon it in Defense Position during your next Standby Phase.

31829185.name: Dark Necrofear
31829185.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 3 Fiend monsters from your GY. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was destroyed in your Monster Zone by an opponent's card and sent there this turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip this card to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster by this effect, take control of that monster.

31987274.name: Flying Fish
31987274.desc: Three wishes are granted to those fortunate enough to see this monster in flight.

32015116.name: Blind Destruction
32015116.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Roll a six-sided die. If the result is 1-5, destroy all monsters on the field with the same Level as the number rolled. If it is 6, destroy all Level 6 and higher monsters on the field.

32268901.name: Salamandra
32268901.desc: Equip only to a FIRE monster. It gains 700 ATK.

32269855.name: The All-Seeing White Tiger
32269855.desc: A proud ruler of the jungle that some fear and others respect.

32437102.name: Dragonic Attack
32437102.desc: This card can only be used to equip Warrior-Type monsters. The equipped monster is treated as Dragon-Type and increases the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 500 points.

32541773.name: The Portrait's Secret
32541773.desc: A portrait cursed by the artist, it is said to bring ill fortune to anyone who owns it.

33550694.name: Fusion Gate
33550694.desc: During the Main Phase: The turn player can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from their Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials mentioned on it from their hand or field.

33737664.name: Graverobber's Retribution
33737664.desc: During each of your Standby Phases, inflict 100 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each of your opponent's monsters that have been removed from play.

33950246.name: Royal Command
33950246.desc: Flip monsters' effects cannot be activated, also their effects are negated.

34016756.name: Riryoku
34016756.desc: Target 2 face-up monsters on the field; halve the ATK of 1 monster, and if you do, add that lost ATK to the other monster. These effects last until the end of this turn.
strings: Select monster to halve the ATK
Select the monster to gain ATK

34694160.name: The Eye of Truth
34694160.desc: Your opponent must keep their hand revealed. Once per turn, during your opponent's Standby Phase, if they have a Spell(s) in their hand: They gain 1000 LP if they have a Spell(s) in their hand at resolution.

35316708.name: Time Seal
35316708.desc: Skip the Draw Phase of your opponent's next turn.

35346968.name: Solemn Wishes
35346968.desc: Increase your Life Points by 500 points each time you draw a card (or cards).

36280194.name: Backup Soldier
36280194.desc: While there are 5 or more monsters in your Graveyard: Target up to 3 non-Effect Monsters with 1500 or less ATK in your Graveyard; add them to your hand.

36468556.name: Ceasefire
36468556.desc: If a face-down Defense Position monster or an Effect Monster is on the field: Change all face-down Defense Position monsters on the field to face-up Defense Position (Flip monsters' effects are not activated at this time), also inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Effect Monster on the field.

36868108.name: Armored Glass
36868108.desc: You can activate this card when a monster is equipped with an Equip Card. Negate the effects of all Equip Cards on the field during the turn this card is activated.

37043180.name: D.D. Warrior
37043180.desc: After damage calculation, when this card battles a monster: Banish that monster, also banish this card.

37313786.name: Gamble
37313786.desc: You can only activate this card when your opponent's hand is 6 or more cards and your hand is 2 or less. Toss a coin and call heads or tails. If you call it right, draw until your hand has 5 cards. If you call it wrong, skip your next turn.

37390589.name: Kunai with Chain
strings: Activate 1 or both of these effects
Change the attacking monster to Defense Position
Equip this card to a face-up monster you control

37580756.name: Michizure
37580756.desc: When a monster is sent from the field to your GY, even during the Damage Step: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

38033121.name: Dark Magician Girl
38033121.desc: Gains 300 ATK for every "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in the GYs.

38247752.name: Dark-Eyes Illusionist
38247752.desc: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; it cannot attack while this card is face-up on the field.

38369349.name: Manga Ryu-Ran
38369349.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Toon" card.)
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 2 monsters, while you control "Toon World". Cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 LP to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks.

38480590.name: Lady Panther
38480590.desc: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 of your monsters destroyed in battle during this turn to the top of your Deck.

39180960.name: Rigorous Reaver
39180960.desc:
FLIP: Each player discards 1 card.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

39256679.name: Beta The Magnet Warrior
39256679.desc: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

39897277.name: Elf's Light
39897277.desc: A LIGHT monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

40133511.name: Bazoo the Soul-Eater
40133511.desc: Once per turn: You can banish up to 3 monsters from your GY; this card gains 300 ATK for each, until the end of your opponent's turn.

40703222.name: Multiply
40703222.desc: Tribute 1 face-up "Kuriboh"; Special Summon as many "Kuriboh Tokens" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 300/DEF 200) as possible, in Defense Position. They cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

40916023.name: Aqua Spirit
40916023.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 WATER monster from your GY. Once per turn, during your opponent's Standby Phase: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position, and if you do, it cannot change its battle position for the rest of this turn.

41855169.name: Jowgen the Spiritualist
41855169.desc: You can discard 1 random card from your hand to the GY; destroy all Special Summoned monsters on the field. Neither player can Special Summon monsters.
strings: Destroy all Special Summoned monsters on the field.

42035044.name: Panther Warrior
42035044.desc: This card cannot declare an attack unless you Tribute 1 monster.

42431843.name: Ancient Brain
42431843.desc: A fallen fairy that is powerful in the dark.

42599677.name: Flame Champion
42599677.desc: A warrior protected by a flaming shield that nullifies any attack.

42703248.name: Giant Trunade
42703248.desc: Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the hand.

43434803.name: The Shallow Grave
43434803.desc: Each player targets 1 monster in their own GY; each player Special Summons the target from their GY in face-down Defense Position.

43711255.name: Prohibition
43711255.desc:
Activate this card by declaring 1 card name. Apply these effects to all cards whose original name is the card name you declared. (This does not apply to card(s) that are already on the field before this effect started applying.)
● They cannot be placed on the field.
● They cannot be activated, nor can their effects be activated or applied.
● They cannot be Summoned or Set.
● They cannot attack, nor can they change their battle positions.
● They cannot be used as material for a Special Summon that requires materials.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.

43973174.name: The Flute of Summoning Dragon
43973174.desc: Special Summon up to 2 Dragon monsters from your hand. "Lord of D." must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

44072894.name: Supply
44072894.desc: FLIP: Return 2 Fusion-Material monsters that were sent to the Graveyard as a result of a Fusion Summon to your hand.

44656491.name: Messenger of Peace
44656491.desc: Monsters with 1500 or more ATK cannot declare an attack. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 100 LP or destroy this card.

44763025.name: Delinquent Duo
44763025.desc: Pay 1000 LP; your opponent discards 1 random card, and if they have any other cards in their hand, discard 1 more card of their choice.

45894482.name: Gilasaurus
45894482.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If Summoned this way: Activate this effect; your opponent can Special Summon 1 monster from their GY.
strings: Would you like to Special Summon from graveyard?

45986603.name: Snatch Steal
45986603.desc: Equip only to a monster your opponent controls. Take control of the equipped monster. During each of your opponent's Standby Phases: They gain 1000 Life Points.
strings: Increase your opponent's Life Points by 1000 points during each of their Standby Phases.

46657337.name: Muka Muka
46657337.desc: This card gains 300 ATK and DEF for each card in your hand.

46700124.name: Machine King
46700124.desc: This card gains 100 ATK for each Machine-Type monster on the field.

46821314.name: Humanoid Slime
46821314.desc: This slime apparently has some human genes in its genetic makeup.

48305365.name: Axe Raider
48305365.desc: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.

48539234.name: Appropriate
48539234.desc: Activate only when your opponent draws a card(s) outside of either Draw Phase. After that, each time your opponent draws a card(s) outside of either Draw Phase, immediately draw 2 cards.

48579379.name: Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth
48579379.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Petit Moth" on your 6th turn or later after it was equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

48766543.name: Cyber-Tech Alligator
48766543.desc:
Originally a pterodactyl, he was viciously attacked by a dragon. Using the newest technologies, his keeper saved him from near-fatal wounds and brought him back as a powerful Cyborg.

(This card is not treated as a "Cyber" card.)

49064413.name: The Masked Beast
49064413.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Curse of the Masked Beast".

49251811.name: Mystic Probe
49251811.desc: You can activate this card when a Continuous Spell Card is activated. Negate all Continuous Spell Cards during the turn this card is activated.

49587034.name: Lightforce Sword
49587034.desc:
Banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand, face-down. During the Standby Phase of your opponent's 4th turn after this card's activation, return that card to their hand.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.

49791927.name: Tiger Axe
49791927.desc: A fast and powerful axe-wielding beast-warrior.

49888191.name: Garnecia Elefantis
49888191.desc: A monster so heavy that each step rocks the earth.

50122883.name: Bite Shoes
50122883.desc: FLIP: Change the Attack or Defense Position of 1 face-up monster on the field. The card must remain face-up.

50287060.name: Archfiend of Gilfer
50287060.desc: When this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip this card to that target. That monster loses 500 ATK while equipped with this card.

50913601.name: Mountain
50913601.desc: All Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

51345461.name: Sword Hunter
51345461.desc:
At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster(s) by battle and sent it to the Graveyard this Battle Phase: Equip all those monsters from the Graveyard to this card as an Equip Spell Card(s) with this effect.
●The equipped monster gains 200 ATK.

52040216.name: Harpie's Pet Dragon
52040216.desc: Gains 300 ATK/DEF for each "Harpie Lady" on the field.

52097679.name: Shield & Sword
52097679.desc: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters currently on the field, until the end of this turn.

52121290.name: Spherous Lady
52121290.desc: Many have been deceived by the beauty of this vampire.

53119267.name: Magical Thorn
53119267.desc: When your opponent's card(s) in their hand are discarded to the Graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage to their Life Points for each card that was discarded.

53183600.name: Blue-Eyes Toon Dragon
53183600.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 2 monsters, while you control "Toon World". Cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 LP to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks.

53530069.name: Spirit of the Breeze
53530069.desc: As long as this card remains in face-up Attack Position on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 1000 points during each of your Standby Phases.

53582587.name: Torrential Tribute
53582587.desc: When a monster(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsters on the field.

54098121.name: Mysterious Puppeteer
54098121.desc:
(This card is not treated as a "Puppet" card.)
If another monster is Normal or Flip Summoned: Gain 500 LP.

54109233.name: Infinite Dismissal
54109233.desc: Level 3 or lower monsters are destroyed during the End Phase of the turn that they are Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned.

55226821.name: Lightning Blade
55226821.desc: Equip only to a Warrior monster. It gains 800 ATK. All WATER monsters on the field lose 500 ATK.

55321970.name: Gust Fan
55321970.desc: A WIND monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

55550921.name: Battle Warrior
55550921.desc: A warrior that fights with his bare hands!!!

55608151.name: Gryphon Wing
55608151.desc: When your opponent activates "Harpie's Feather Duster": Negate its effect, and if you do, destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.

55784832.name: Morinphen
55784832.desc: A strange fiend with long arms and razor-sharp talons.

56260110.name: Raimei
56260110.desc: Decrease your opponent's Life Points by 300 points.

56387350.name: Vampire Baby
56387350.desc: At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle and sent it to the GY this turn: You can Special Summon that monster to your field.

56747793.name: United We Stand
56747793.desc: The equipped monster gains 800 ATK/DEF for each face-up monster you control.

56948373.name: Mask of the Accursed
56948373.desc: The equipped monster cannot attack. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Inflict 500 damage to the controller of the equipped monster.

57409948.name: Bombardment Beetle
57409948.desc: FLIP: Pick up and see 1 face-down Defense Position Monster Card on your opponent's side of the field. If it is an Effect Monster, destroy it (its Flip Effect is not activated), and if the card is not, return it to its original position.

57579381.name: Darklord Marie
57579381.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You gain 200 LP. This card must be in the Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect.

57617178.name: Sonic Bird
57617178.desc: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand.
strings: Select 1 Ritual Spell Card from your Deck

57839750.name: Mother Grizzly
57839750.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 WATER monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in Attack Position.

57882509.name: Mask of Weakness
57882509.desc: Target 1 attacking monster; that target loses 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

57953380.name: Card of Safe Return
57953380.desc: When a monster is Special Summoned from your Graveyard, you can draw 1 card.

58314394.name: Ground Attacker Bugroth
58314394.desc: A surface battle robot that was once used for sea warfare.

58551308.name: Spear Cretin
58551308.desc: FLIP: When this card is sent to the Graveyard after being flipped, each player selects 1 monster from their Graveyard, and Special Summons it in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position.

58621589.name: Shadow of Eyes
58621589.desc: When a monster(s) is Set on your opponent's field: Target 1 of those Set monsters; change that Set monster to face-up Attack Position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)

58696829.name: Bio-Mage
58696829.desc: A mysterious priest created as a result of the latest advances in biotechnology.

58775978.name: Nightmare's Steelcage
58775978.desc: This card remains on the field for 2 of your opponent's turns. While this card is face-up on the field, no monsters can attack.

58818411.name: Empress Mantis
58818411.desc: Queen of an army of giant mantises whose command moves legions.

58921041.name: Anti-Spell Fragrance
58921041.desc:
Both players must Set Spell Cards before activating them. If either player Sets a Spell Card, that Spell Card cannot be activated until their next turn.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.

59197169.name: Yami
59197169.desc: All Fiend and Spellcaster monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Fairy monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

59344077.name: Magic Drain
59344077.desc: When your opponent activates a Spell Card: They can discard 1 Spell to negate this card's effect, otherwise negate the activation of their Spell Card, and if you do, destroy it.

59560625.name: Shift
59560625.desc: When your opponent targets exactly 1 monster you control (and no other cards) for an attack, or with a Spell/Trap effect: Target another monster you control that would be an appropriate target; that attack/Spell/Trap now targets the new target.

59744639.name: Windstorm of Etaqua
59744639.desc: Change the battle positions of all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

59784896.name: Dark Zebra
59784896.desc: If this is the only Monster Card in your control during your Standby Phase, it is changed to Defense Position. You cannot change the position of this card during the same turn.

60082869.name: Dust Tornado
60082869.desc: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

60682203.name: Cold Wave
60682203.desc: This card can only be activated at the start of Main Phase 1. Until your next turn, you and your opponent cannot play or Set any Spell or Trap Cards.
strings: Affected by "Cold Wave": cannot activate or Set any Spell/Trap Cards

60806437.name: UFO Turtle
60806437.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 FIRE monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in Attack Position.

60862676.name: Flame Cerebrus
60862676.desc: Known to many as the "Burning Executioner", this monster is capable of burning enemies to cinders.

60866277.name: Earthshaker
60866277.desc: Select 2 Monster Card Attributes. Your opponent then selects 1 of the 2 Attributes and destroys all face-up monsters with that Attribute on the field.

61405855.name: Sword of Dragon's Soul
61405855.desc: Equip only to a Warrior monster. It gains 700 ATK. After damage calculation, if the equipped monster battled a Dragon monster: Destroy that monster at the end of that Battle Phase.

61528025.name: Banisher of the Light
61528025.desc: Any card sent to the GY is banished instead.

61705417.name: Graverobber
61705417.desc: Select 1 Spell Card from your opponent's Graveyard. You can use it as your hand until the end of the turn. If you use it, you take 2000 points of damage.

61740673.name: Imperial Order
61740673.desc: Negate all Spell effects on the field. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, you must pay 700 LP (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed.

61831093.name: Greenkappa
61831093.desc: FLIP: Target 2 Set Spell/Trap Cards on the field; destroy those targets.

62279055.name: Magic Cylinder
62279055.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

62867251.name: Light of Intervention
62867251.desc:
Monster Cards cannot be changed to face-down Defense Position. If a monster would be Normal Set or Special Summoned face-down, it must be Summoned in face-up Defense Position instead.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.

63162310.name: Wall Shadow
63162310.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Magical Labyrinth".

63391643.name: Thousand Knives
63391643.desc: If you control "Dark Magician": Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

63689843.name: Attack and Receive
63689843.desc: You can only activate this card when you take damage to your Life Points. Inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. Also, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each "Attack and Receive" card in your Graveyard.

64335804.name: Red-Eyes Black Metal Dragon
64335804.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" equipped with "Metalmorph".

64389297.name: Magical Labyrinth
64389297.desc: Equip only to "Labyrinth Wall". You can Tribute the equipped monster; Special Summon "Wall Shadow" from your Deck.

64428736.name: Alligator's Sword
64428736.desc: ey, dis mighty lissard man can swing his sword so fast, dat it's more dan da speed a sound!

64752646.name: Fire Princess
64752646.desc: Each time you gain Life Points, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
strings: Inflict damage when you gain Life Points

65240384.name: Big Shield Gardna
65240384.desc: When a Spell Card is activated that targets this face-down card (and no other cards) (Quick Effect): Change this card to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, negate the activation. If this card is attacked, change it to Attack Position at the end of the Damage Step.

65458948.name: Toon Mermaid
65458948.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand), while you control "Toon World". Cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 LP to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks.

65475294.name: The Unfriendly Amazon
65475294.desc: Offer 1 of your monsters on the field as a Tribute (excluding this monster) during each of your Standby Phases. If you cannot, this card is destroyed. Monsters used for a Tribute Summon or that are offered as Tributes due to other cards' effects are excluded.
strings: Tribute 1 monster for the effect of "The Unfriendly Amazon"?

65570596.name: Red Archery Girl
65570596.desc: A mermaid archer that hides in a protective shell, waiting for the right moment to strike.

66719324.name: Rain of Mercy
66719324.desc: Increase the Life Points of both players by 1000 points.

66927994.name: Oni Tank T-34
66927994.desc: An armored tank possessed by a fiend that will pursue enemies until they're crushed.

66989694.name: The Earl of Demise
66989694.desc: This gentlemanly creature is extremely wicked, feared by man and fiend alike.

67049542.name: Dark Bat
67049542.desc: Bats from the netherworld that use their hyper senses to detect their enemies.

67105242.name: Earthbound Spirit
67105242.desc: A vengeful creature formed by the spirits of fallen warriors, it drags any who dare approach it into the deepest bowels of the earth.

67371383.name: Amphibian Beast
67371383.desc: On land or in the sea, the speed of this monster is unmatchable.

67532912.name: Science Soldier
67532912.desc: Soldiers equipped with state-of-the-art weaponry to face unknown creatures.

68049471.name: The Gross Ghost of Fled Dreams
68049471.desc: This monster feeds on the dreams of an unwary sleeper, dragging the victim into eternal slumber.

68400115.name: The Emperor's Holiday
68400115.desc: Negate all Equip Card effects on the field.

68401546.name: Fairy's Gift
68401546.desc: This flying monster is known for delivering happiness to all.

68540058.name: Metalmorph
68540058.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip this card to that target. It gains 300 ATK/DEF. If it attacks, it gains ATK equal to half the ATK of the attack target, during damage calculation only.

69015963.name: Cyber-Stein
69015963.desc:
(This card is not treated as a "Cyber" card.)
You can pay 5000 LP; Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck in Attack Position.

69122763.name: Deal of Phantom
69122763.desc: Select 1 monster face-up on the field. Increase the selected monster's ATK by 100 points for each monster in your Graveyard during the turn this card is activated. The number of monster(s) are applied when this card is activated.

69140098.name: Gemini Elf
69140098.desc: Elf twins that alternate their attacks.

69750536.name: Wow Warrior
69750536.desc: A fish with arms, legs, and some very sharp teeth.

69832741.name: Spirit Elimination
69832741.desc: When monsters in the Graveyard are removed from play, remove monsters on your side of the field from play as substitutes. This card remains active until the end of the turn that it is activated. The substitutes remain removed from play.
strings: Select monsters on your field to banish

69954399.name: Ekibyo Drakmord
69954399.desc: The equipped monster cannot attack. Destroy the equipped monster at the end of its controller's 2nd turn after this card is activated. At that time, this card is returned to the owner's hand.

70344351.name: Riryoku Field
70344351.desc: When a Spell Card that targets exactly 1 monster on the field (and no other cards) is activated: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

70828912.name: Premature Burial
70828912.desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

71044499.name: Nobleman of Crossout
71044499.desc: Target 1 face-down monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, banish it, then, if it was a Flip monster, each player reveals their Main Deck, then banishes all cards from it with that monster's name.

71283180.name: Tornado Bird
71283180.desc: FLIP: Return 2 Spell or Trap Cards on the field to their owners' hands.

71466592.name: Maryokutai
71466592.desc: During your opponent's turn, when your opponent activates a Spell Card (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

71625222.name: Time Wizard
71625222.desc: Once per turn: You can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy all monsters your opponent controls. If you call it wrong, destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, take damage equal to half the total ATK those destroyed monsters had while face-up on the field.

72929454.name: Turtle Bird
72929454.desc: An unusual turtle that not only swims at tremendous speeds, but can also sail across the skies.

73079365.name: Gust
73079365.desc: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your Spell Cards are destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect your opponent controls. Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

73216412.name: Worm Drake
73216412.desc: Once this monster wraps itself around a victim, there is no escape.

73915051.name: Scapegoat
73915051.desc: Special Summon 4 "Sheep Tokens" (Beast/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. They cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon. You cannot Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card (but you can Normal Set).
strings: Affected by "Scapegoat": cannot Summon other monsters

74137509.name: Graceful Dice
74137509.desc: Roll a six-sided die. All monsters you currently control gain ATK/DEF equal to the result x 100, until the end of this turn.

74637266.name: Octoberser
74637266.desc: With the head of a fish and the legs of an octopus, this strange creature attacks enemies by flinging spears.

74677422.name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon
74677422.desc: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

74701381.name: DNA Surgery
74701381.desc: Activate this card by declaring 1 Monster Type. All face-up monsters on the field become that Type.

74923978.name: Forced Requisition
74923978.desc: You can activate this card when you discard from your hand. After that, each time you discard from your hand, your opponent must also discard the same number of cards from his/her hand.

75347539.name: Valkyrion the Magna Warrior
75347539.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Alpha The Magnet Warrior", "Beta The Magnet Warrior", and "Gamma The Magnet Warrior" from your hand and/or field. You can Tribute this card, then target 1 "Alpha The Magnet Warrior", "Beta The Magnet Warrior", and "Gamma The Magnet Warrior" in your GY; Special Summon them.

75372290.name: Total Defense Shogun
75372290.desc: This card is changed to Defense Position when it is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned successfully. This card can attack while it is in Defense Position. If this card attacks while in Defense Position, apply the ATK of this card for damage calculation.

75646520.name: Metal Detector
75646520.desc: You can activate this card when a Continuous Trap Card is activated. Negate all Continuous Trap Cards during the turn this card is activated.

76305638.name: The Rock Spirit
76305638.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 EARTH monster from your GY. Gains 300 ATK during your opponent's Battle Phase only.

76775123.name: Patrol Robo
76775123.desc: During your Standby Phase, you can look at 1 face-down card that's been Set by your opponent as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

76792184.name: Black Magic Ritual
76792184.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Magician of Black Chaos". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 8 or more.

77207191.name: Berfomet
77207191.desc: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" from your Deck to your hand.

77414722.name: Magic Jammer
77414722.desc: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

77527210.name: Soul of Purity and Light
77527210.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 2 LIGHT monsters in your Graveyard. All monsters your opponent controls lose 300 ATK during their Battle Phase only.

77585513.name: Jinzo
77585513.desc: Trap Cards, and their effects on the field, cannot be activated. Negate all Trap effects on the field.

78010363.name: Witch of the Black Forest
78010363.desc: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Witch of the Black Forest" once per turn.

78193831.name: Buster Blader
78193831.desc: Gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster your opponent controls or is in their GY.

78423643.name: Three-Headed Geedo
78423643.desc: A three-headed nocturnal monster that is absolutely ruthless when fighting.

78636495.name: Slate Warrior
78636495.desc:
FLIP: This card gains 500 ATK and DEF.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

78658564.name: Goblin Attack Force
78658564.desc: If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase, and its battle position cannot be changed until the End Phase of your next turn.

78861134.name: Darkfire Soldier #2
78861134.desc: A warrior who gained immeasurable power from the heart of a volcano.

78984772.name: Twin-Headed Fire Dragon
78984772.desc: Two dragons fused as one from the effects of the Big Bang.

79106360.name: Morphing Jar #2
79106360.desc: FLIP: Shuffle all monsters on the field into the Deck. Then, each player excavates cards from the top of their Deck, until they excavate the same number of monsters they shuffled into their Main Deck. Special Summon all excavated Level 4 or lower monsters in face-down Defense Position, also send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

79759861.name: Tribute to The Doomed
79759861.desc: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

79853073.name: Cipher Soldier
79853073.desc: If this card battles a Warrior-Type monster, during damage calculation: This card gains 2000 ATK and DEF during that damage calculation only.

79870141.name: Mad Sword Beast
79870141.desc: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

80604092.name: Ultimate Offering
80604092.desc: During your Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase: You can pay 500 Life Points; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon/Set 1 monster.

80987696.name: Time Machine
80987696.desc:
When exactly 1 monster is destroyed by battle, and that monster is sent to the GY: Special Summon that monster to the same field it was on, in the same battle position it was in when destroyed.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.

81210420.name: Magical Hats
81210420.desc: During your opponent's Battle Phase: Choose 2 Spells/Traps from your Deck and 1 monster in your Main Monster Zone. Special Summon them as Normal Monsters (ATK 0/DEF 0) in face-down Defense Position, Set the chosen monster if it is face-up, and shuffle them on the field. The 2 cards chosen from your Deck are destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase, and cannot remain on the field except during this Battle Phase.

82432018.name: Mask of Brutality
82432018.desc: The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK and loses 1000 DEF. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 1000 LP or destroy this card.

83011278.name: Mystic Tomato
83011278.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 DARK monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

83746708.name: Mage Power
83746708.desc: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF for each Spell/Trap you control.

83764719.name: Monster Reborn
83764719.desc: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

83994646.name: 4-Starred Ladybug of Doom
83994646.desc: FLIP: Destroy all Level 4 monsters your opponent controls.

84080939.name: The Forgiving Maiden
84080939.desc: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return to your hand 1 of your monsters destroyed as a result of battle during this turn.

84620194.name: Girochin Kuwagata
84620194.desc: Despite its small size, this monster has powerful jaws that can rip metal to shreds.

84834865.name: Flying Kamakiri #1
84834865.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 WIND monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

84926738.name: The Immortal of Thunder
84926738.desc: FLIP: Increase your Life Points by 3000 points. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you lose 5000 Life Points.

85602018.name: Last Will
85602018.desc: If a monster on your side of the field was sent to your Graveyard this turn, you can Special Summon 1 monster with an ATK of 1500 points or less from your Deck once during this turn. Then shuffle your Deck.
strings: Do you want to activate the effect of "Last Will"?

85742772.name: Gravity Bind
85742772.desc: Level 4 or higher monsters cannot attack.

85802526.name: Cure Mermaid
85802526.desc: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 800 points during each of your Standby Phases.

86088138.name: Ocubeam
86088138.desc: Frightening in appearance, this creature uses its large eyes and ears to keep track of any movement.

86099788.name: The Last Warrior from Another Planet
86099788.desc:
"Zombyra the Dark" + "Maryokutai"
If this card is Special Summoned: Destroy all other monsters you control. Neither player can Summon monsters.

86198326.name: 7 Completed
86198326.desc: Activate this card by choosing ATK or DEF; equip only to a Machine monster. It gains 700 ATK or DEF, depending on the choice.

86281779.name: Gadget Soldier
86281779.desc: A rust-free machine warrior born to battle.

86318356.name: Sogen
86318356.desc: All Warrior and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

86569121.name: Melchid the Four-Face Beast
86569121.desc: This monster has four different masks for four different attacks.

87303357.name: Shining Abyss
87303357.desc: This monster employs the powers of both Light and Darkness.

87430998.name: Forest
87430998.desc: All Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

87511987.name: Spikebot
87511987.desc: A mechanical soldier created by a wicked sorcerer, it attacks with the two steel balls attached to its arms.

88240808.name: Kycoo the Ghost Destroyer
88240808.desc: When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target up to 2 monsters in their GY; banish those targets. Your opponent cannot banish cards from either GY.
strings: Select up to 2 monsters to banish

88472456.name: Zombyra the Dark
88472456.desc: Cannot attack directly. If this card destroys a monster by battle: This card loses 200 ATK.

88733579.name: Drill Bug
88733579.desc: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can select 1 "Parasite Paracide" card from your Deck, shuffle the Deck, and place "Parasite Paracide" on top of the Deck.

88819587.name: Baby Dragon
88819587.desc: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

90147755.name: Lady Assailant of Flames
90147755.desc: FLIP: Banish the top 3 cards of your Deck; inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

90502999.name: Ground Collapse
90502999.desc: Select 2 Main Monster Zones on the field. Neither player can use the selected zones. You cannot select a zone that is occupied by a Monster Card.

90908427.name: Steel Ogre Grotto #2
90908427.desc: A mechanized iron doll with tremendous strength.

90925163.name: Dancing Fairy
90925163.desc: As long as this card remains in face-up Defense Position on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 1000 points during each of your Standby Phases.

91512835.name: Insect Queen
91512835.desc: Gains 200 ATK for each Insect monster on the field. Cannot declare an attack unless you Tribute 1 monster. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card destroyed an opponent's monster by battle this turn: Special Summon 1 "Insect Monster Token" (Insect/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) in Attack Position.

91842653.name: Toon Summoned Skull
91842653.desc:
(This card is always treated as an "Archfiend" card.)
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 monster, while you control "Toon World". Cannot attack the turn it is Special Summoned. You must pay 500 LP to declare an attack with this monster. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks.

91869203.name: Amazoness Archer
91869203.desc: You can Tribute 2 monsters; inflict 1200 damage to your opponent.

93108297.name: Liquid Beast
93108297.desc: A liquid life form that thrives on water.

93599951.name: Dark Spirit of the Silent
93599951.desc: Activate only when an opponent's monster declares an attack. Negate that attack, and select another face-up monster your opponent controls. That monster attacks instead. (If it is in face-up Defense Position, change it to Attack Position.)

93920745.name: Penguin Soldier
93920745.desc: FLIP: You can target up to 2 monsters on the field; return those targets to the hand.

94163677.name: Infinite Cards
94163677.desc: There is no limit to the hand size for each player.

94377247.name: Curse of the Masked Beast
94377247.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "The Masked Beast". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 8 or more.

95132338.name: Aqua Chorus
95132338.desc: If there are monsters with the same name on the field, those monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF.

95178994.name: Giant Germ
95178994.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent, then you can Special Summon any number of "Giant Germs" from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.
strings: Special Summon another "Giant Germ" from your Deck?

95220856.name: Vengeful Bog Spirit
95220856.desc: Monsters cannot attack the turn they are Summoned.

95286165.name: De-Fusion
95286165.desc:
Target 1 Fusion Monster on the field; return that target to the Extra Deck, then, if all its listed materials that were used for its Fusion Summon are in your GY, you can Special Summon all of them.

* The above text is unofficial and describes the card's functionality in the OCG.
strings: Special Summon all of the materials that were used for its Fusion Summon?

95956346.name: Shining Angel
95956346.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

96008713.name: Magical Arm Shield
96008713.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while they control 2 or more face-up monsters and you control a monster: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; take control of that face-up monster (until the end of the Battle Phase), and if you do, change the attack target to it and perform damage calculation.

96355986.name: Enchanted Javelin
96355986.desc: Increase your Life Points by the ATK of 1 attacking monster.

96890582.name: Flash Assailant
96890582.desc: Decrease the ATK and DEF of this card by 400 points for each card in your hand.

96965364.name: Insect Imitation
96965364.desc: Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 Insect monster from your Deck whose Level is 1 higher than the Tributed monster had on the field.

97017120.name: Giant Rat
97017120.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck in Attack Position.

97077563.name: Call of the Haunted
97077563.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

97687912.name: Fairy Meteor Crush
97687912.desc: If the equipped monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

97809599.name: Seal of the Ancients
97809599.desc: Pay 1000 Life Points. Pick up and see all face-down cards on your opponent's side of the field, then return them to their original positions. (The effects of the face-down cards are not activated.)

98049915.name: Mystic Lamp
98049915.desc: This monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

98139712.name: Skull Invitation
98139712.desc: Each time a card(s) is sent to the Graveyard, inflict 300 damage to its owner for each card sent.

98299011.name: Gift of The Mystical Elf
98299011.desc: Increase your Life Points by 300 points for each monster on the field.

98456117.name: Boneheimer
98456117.desc: This monster wanders the seas, sucking dry any creatures it may encounter.

99785935.name: Alpha The Magnet Warrior
99785935.desc: Alpha, Beta, and Gamma meld as one to form a powerful monster.

99789342.name: Dark Magic Curtain
99789342.desc: Pay half your LP; Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your Deck. You cannot Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card (but you can Normal Set).
strings: Affected by "Dark Magic Curtain": cannot Summon
